Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28370 affecting package python-tornado for versions less than 6.3.3-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-28370 affecting package python-tornado for versions less than 6.3.3-11. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tornado is earlier than 6.3.3-11, affected by CVE-2023-28370
